Item ID1337

A bronze warhammer is a warhammer made with 3 bronze bars, requiring 9 Smithing, yielding 37.5 Smithing experience.

It can be purchased from Skulgrimen's Battle Gear and Vigr's Warhammers for 61 coins.

One can substitute a regular hammer when banging the big door at the entrance of Bandos' Stronghold in the God Wars Dungeon.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
7 July 2021
(update)

The weapon's position on female players has been adjusted so that they appear to be equipped properly.

29 March 2004
(update)

The item became permanently available with the launch of RuneScape 2.

1 December 2003
(update)

The item was added to the RuneScape 2 Beta.

[[File:Bronze warhammer detail.png|left|120px]]
A '''bronze warhammer''' is a [[warhammer]] made with 3 [[bronze bar]]s, requiring 9 [[Smithing]], yielding 37.5 Smithing [[experience]].

It can be purchased from [[Skulgrimen's Battle Gear]] and [[Vigr's Warhammers]] for {{NoCoins|61}} coins.

One can substitute a regular [[hammer]] when banging the big door at the entrance of [[Bandos' Stronghold]] in the [[God Wars Dungeon]].
